name: Angelic Page
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its messenger.

name: Balduvian Barbarians
flavor_text:
"From the snowy slopes of Kaelor,
To the canyons of Bandu,
We drink and fight and feast and die
As we were born to do."
—Balduvian tavern song

name: Blood Pet
oracle_text: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B}.
flavor_text: No thrull has ever been burdened with a long life.

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Returne from whence ye came. . . ."
—Edmund Spenser,
*The Faerie Queene*

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Circle of Protection: Black
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Blue
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Green
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Red
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: White
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Cloudchaser Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Most eagles hunt small animals. The cloudchasers hunt magic.

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor_text: The coral merfolk delight in wrestling with their foes, skinning them alive on the razor-sharp edges of their reef.

name: Corrupt
oracle_text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Crossbow Infantry
oracle_text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Twang. You're dead.

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Hence 'banishèd' is banished from the world, / And the world's exile is death."
—William Shakespeare,
*Romeo and Juliet*

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Drudge Skeletons
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral,
*Necromancer's Handbook*

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

name: Eager Cadet
flavor_text: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the 'training' I needed."

name: Fear
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: "Booga booga booga!"

name: Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Force Spike
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: "I don't *think* so."

name: Giant Cockroach
flavor_text: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Octopus
flavor_text: The only thing that flows faster than water is fear.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
Watching the spider's web
—Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

name: Goblin Chariot
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

name: Goblin Digging Team
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
flavor_text:
"Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Die!"
—Goblin chant

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
We're *elite*. You're not.
—Infantry motto

name: Goblin Gardener
oracle_text: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.
flavor_text: Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

name: Goblin Raider
oracle_text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor_text: He's smart for a goblin. He can do *two* things: hit *and* run.

name: Goblin Spelunkers
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Goblins prefer caves to just about anything else. Caves prefer just about anything else to goblins.

name: Gorilla Chieftain
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
flavor_text: A gorilla chief must always be prepared to defend his crown. This leads to some pretty tough apes.

name: Granite Grip
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.
flavor_text: "Let me introduce you to Rocky."

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: They've got claws as long as your arm. And they're grouchy. Really, really grouchy.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot.

name: Hollow Dogs
oracle_text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Honor Guard
oracle_text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

name: Howl from Beyond
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Whether it howls for hunger or for joy, you're in trouble just the same.

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.

name: Knight Errant
flavor_text: Knights are quick to pledge their loyalty and even quicker to charge into battle.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch!"

name: Lightning Blast
oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"I'll climb down soon. Don't worry, it's just a thundersto—"
—Former elvish scout

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave,
He passes from life to his rest in the grave."
—William Knox, "Mortality"

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Llanowar covers a million square miles, yet nobody enters the forest without the elves knowing it.

name: Lone Wolf
oracle_text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor_text: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

name: Looming Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: "Eri phar phesta . . . um, phistor . . . er, phistara . . ."

name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
flavor_text:
"The paladins would be wise not to forget about the Pearl Trident. The merfolk warriors have turned the tide of more than one human war . . . and I have no doubt they shall do so again."
—Onean scholar

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Get in touch with your inner monster.

name: Nausea
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

name: Ostracize
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "You won't be needing this."

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: Without warriors there can be no war.

name: Plague Beetle
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: No one knows whether they were named for the diseases they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: He wastes his amazing talents on proving how amazing he really is.

name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
oracle_text:
Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.
{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Do not judge a lizard by its size.
—Ghitu proverb

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

name: Razorfoot Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

name: Razortooth Rats
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: They'll chew through armor, flesh, and bone. They'll even chew through each other if they're hungry enough.

name: Reclaim
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

name: Redwood Treefolk
flavor_text:
And would you strip the bark from a treefolk?
—Elvish expression meaning "Are you crazy?"

name: Reflexes
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly."
—Combat trainer

name: Regeneration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"Why should death always have the last word?"
—Llanowar druid

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Sabretooth Tiger
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: "Here, kitty kitty. Here, kitty kitty. Aaaaugh!"

name: Sacred Nectar
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"Kubla Khan"

name: Sage Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Samite Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Why does a Samite heal? You might as well ask why a bird flies.

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: "Abandon ship!"

name: Seeker of Skybreak
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor_text: Seekers spend their lives protecting a home they rarely visit.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: They're the fiercest of all the Western Paladin's soldiers. They're also the most fiercely loyal—but that loyalty comes at a price.

name: Shanodin Dryads
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Where dryads dance, seeds sprout and flowers bloom.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.

name: Shield Wall
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"If not for the wizard, we'd all be dead now. 'Course, it was him that started all this in the first place."
—Onean veteran

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Skyshroud Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: The earliest mystics believed that the falcon slit the sky to let the light break through.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "Most people believe magic is only a trick. Why change their minds?"

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now *that's* a plan!"
—Wandering mage

name: Spineless Thug
oracle_text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor_text: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"We were ready for an attack from the front, sides, or back—but the mage hit us from below."
—Veteran soldier

name: Squall
oracle_text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"May the winds blow till they have wakened death. . . ."
—William Shakespeare,
*Othello*

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: They fight so closely together a mouse couldn't slip past their guard.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Stream of Life
oracle_text: Target player gains X life.

name: Telepathic Spies
oracle_text: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.
flavor_text: Most spies sneak into enemy camps. These spies sneak into enemy minds.

name: Tolarian Winds
oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text:
Why not ask the winds?
—Tolarian expression meaning "Who knows?"

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

name: Tranquility
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

name: Twiddle
oracle_text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: "I don't *feel* any different."

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "I rely not so much on the wisdom of age as on the overconfidence of youth."

name: Vigilant Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
flavor_text: It can stay aloft for weeks with little or no sleep.

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"But high she shoots through air and light,
Above all low delay,
Where nothing earthly bounds her flight,
Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore,
"Oh that I had Wings"

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.
